user_question: How can I tutor a 10-year-old in creative writing, and can you generate a creative writing prompt image?
final_answer: To tutor a 10-year-old in creative writing, focus on storytelling basics, character development, and fun writing exercises. Image of a creative writing prompt generated. A fun exercise is 'Character Swap': Write a story where two characters swap roles for a day.
